fields.notes: Absent from city, town, or unincorporated place

fields.field_name: Requesting for presidential primary (may be absent)
fields.notes: Date not announced; request 14 days after filing period; only if will be absent

Unable to vote due to disability
Cannot appear due to employment obligation
fields.notes: Any time during polling hours; includes care of children and infirm adults

fields.notes: Winter storm/blizzard/ice storm warning; safety concerns

fields.notes: Winter storm/blizzard/ice storm warning; need to care for children/infirm adults

fields.notes: Date of primary election; Section V required

fields.field_name: State General or Special General Election

Currently registered with party; requesting ballot

fields.field_name: Registered as undeclared, declaring Democratic party
Registered as undeclared, declaring Republican party

fields.notes: Cell or number for contact before and on election day preferred

fields.field_name: ID Verification - Include copy of photo ID
ID Verification - Personally present qualifying photo ID
fields.notes: To clerk or designee prior to ballot issuance

fields.field_name: Notarization - Printed Name of Notarial Officer

notes: New Hampshire Application for State Election Absentee Ballot-RSA 657:4 (September 30, 2025). For Absence, Religious Observance, or Disability. Uniformed and overseas citizen voters residing outside US use federal post card application. Application forms must be received or postmarked within 6 months of election; applications received/postmarked before 6-month period not accepted. Separate form required for each election. Power of attorney not acceptable for signature. Voter must sign and verify identity by one of three methods: (1) include copy of photo ID meeting RSA 659:13,II(a), (2) personally present qualifying photo ID to clerk/designee before ballot issuance, or (3) include notarized signature. Can be used Monday before election for winter storm emergency if elderly/infirm/disabled with safety concerns, or if school/childcare/adult care canceled. Employment obligation includes care of children and infirm adults, with or without compensation. False statement is misdemeanor. Track absentee ballot at https://app.sos.nh.gov. Mail or hand deliver to local city/town clerk.
